zodiacFlow.shortDescription: Track moods, discover zodiac insights, and connect with your cosmic self.

zodiacFlowPage.title: Zodiac Flow
zodiacFlowPage.subtitle: Mood Tracker & Zodiac Insights
zodiacFlowPage.heroDescription: Discover the connection between your emotions and the cosmos. Track your daily moods, gain insights based on your zodiac sign, and join a community of cosmic explorers.

moodTracking.title: Intuitive Mood Tracking
moodTracking.description: Log your emotions with beautiful, easy-to-use interface. Add notes, track patterns, and understand yourself better.

zodiacInsights.title: Zodiac Insights
zodiacInsights.description: Receive personalized insights based on your zodiac sign. Discover how cosmic energy influences your emotional journey.

analytics.title: Analytics & Trends
analytics.description: Visualize your mood patterns over time. Identify triggers, celebrate wins, and grow emotionally.

community.title: Zodiac Community
community.description: Connect with others who share your sign. Share experiences and support each other.

notifications.title: Gentle Reminders
notifications.description: Customizable notifications to help you maintain your tracking habit.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your emotional data is yours. I prioritize your privacy and data security.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your journey
pricing.trialNote: All premium plans include a 7-day free trial. Cancel anytime.
pricing.appleNote: Subscriptions are managed through the App Store. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account.

q1.question: How does the zodiac feature work?
q1.answer: Based on your birth date, I provide personalized insights that combine your mood patterns with zodiac characteristics. It's a fun way to add cosmic perspective to your emotional journey.

q2.question: Is my data private?
q2.answer: Absolutely. Your mood data is stored securely and never shared with third parties. You can delete your data at any time through the app settings.

q3.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime through your App Store subscription settings. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

q4.question: What devices are supported?
q4.answer: Zodiac Flow is available for iOS devices running iOS 15.0 or later.

support.title: Contact
support.subtitle: I'm here to help
support.description: Have questions, feedback, or need assistance? I'd love to hear from you.
support.contactDescription: Reach out via email and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

help.title: Help & Support
help.description: For technical support or questions about my apps.

business.title: Business
business.description: For collaboration offers, media, or other inquiries.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Share your thoughts on how I can improve my apps.

q1.question: How do I reset my password?
q1.answer: You can reset your password through the app's login screen by tapping 'Forgot Password' and following the instructions sent to your email.

q2.question: How do I restore my purchases?
q2.answer: Go to Settings > Subscription > Restore Purchases in the app. Make sure you're signed in with the same Apple ID used for the original purchase.

q3.question: The app is not working properly, what should I do?
q3.answer: Try closing and reopening the app. If the issue persists, try updating to the latest version or reinstalling. Contact me if problems continue.

dataRequest.title: Data & Privacy Requests
dataRequest.description: You have full control over your personal data.
dataRequest.deleteDescription: To request deletion of your account and associated data, please email me with the subject line 'Data Deletion Request' and include the email address associated with your account.
dataRequest.exportDescription: To receive a copy of your personal data, email me with the subject line 'Data Export Request'.
